subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hunter Pence, an outfielder for the Houston Astros, made a seamless transition from the minors to the starting lineup last season and was a front-runner for National League rookie of the year.
snippet: Hunter Pence, an outfielder for the Houston Astros, made a seamless transition from the minors to the starting lineup last season and was a front-runner for National League rookie of the year.
